TitlePage.Title: The &SCO; Package Manual
TitlePage.Subtitle: Simplicial Cohomology of Orbifolds
TitlePage.Author:
Simon Goertzen
Lehrstuhl B für Mathematik
RWTH Aachen
Templergraben 64
52056 Aachen
(Germany)
simon.goertzen@rwth-aachen.de http://wwwb.math.rwth-aachen.de/˜simon
TitlePage.Abstract: This document explains the primary uses of the &SCO; package. Included in this manual is a documented list of the most important methods and functions you will need. For the theoretical basis of this package please refer to my diploma thesis and the corresponding paper (cit.).
TitlePage.Acknowledgements: The &SCO; package would not have been possible without the theoretical work by I. Moerdijk and D. A. Pronk (cit.) concerning simplicial cohomology of orbifolds. Many thanks to these two, as well as Dr. Mohamed Barakat and the Lehrstuhl B für Mathematik at RWTH Aachen University in general. It should be noted that &SCO; in its current functionality is dependant on the &homalg; package by Dr. Barakat, as it relies on &homalg; to do the actual computations.
